title: EPL datasets and plot
text: package ideal sports analysts, data enthusiasts, fans interested -depth EPL analysis 2021-2022 season. two clean datasets full league table result halftime result, also plot indicating teams gain benefits games ended halftime. can open shiny app dashboard explore datasets.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Cao H (2024). EPLstats2122: English Premier League 2021-2022 Season Analysis. R package version 0.1.0, https://etc5523-2024.github.io/assignment-4-packages--shiny-apps-nghiacao2001/.

title: English Premier League 2021-2022 Season Analysis
text: EPLstats2122 package provides tools analyzing 2021-2022 English Premier League (EPL) season, focusing team performance metrics league position changes. package, can explore full-time halftime results, view team statistics, analyze changes league positions interactive tables visualizations. package ideal sports analysts, data enthusiasts, fans interested -depth EPL analysis 2021-2022 season

title: Full League Table Dataset — full_league_table
text: dataset contains information 2021-2022 league standings, including team names, matches played, points.

title: Full League Table Dataset — full_league_table
text: data frame 20 rows 10 variables: Pos. Position team league Team Name team MP Matches played W Wins D Draws L Losses GF Goals GA Goals GD Goal Difference Points Points accumulated finish_time Time period (e.g., full_time)

what: Generate Full Season Stats for a Team — full_season_stats
title: Generate Full Season Stats for a Team — full_season_stats
text: function calculates full season statistics given team English Premier League dataset.

title: Generate Full Season Stats for a Team — full_season_stats
code: full_season_stats(x, teamName, resultColumn = FTR, resultPrefix = FT)

title: Generate Full Season Stats for a Team — full_season_stats
text: x data frame match data. teamName name team calculate stats . resultColumn column representing match result. resultPrefix Prefix home away goal columns (default "FT" full-time).

title: Generate Full Season Stats for a Team — full_season_stats
Half-Time Results Dataset — half_time_results
text: dataset contains half-time results 2021-2022 league season, including team positions, points, statistics games ended halftime.

title: Half-Time Results Dataset — half_time_results
text: data frame 20 rows 10 variables: Pos. Position team league halftime Team Name team MP Matches played W Wins halftime D Draws halftime L Losses halftime GF Goals halftime GA Goals halftime GD Goal Difference halftime Points Points accumulated halftime finish_time Time period indicating 'half_time'
